questions.name: annualIncome
questions.title: What's your total annual income, before taxes?
questions.note: We may need to confirm this later so try to be as accurate as possible.
questions.tooltipText: This is your gross income (before tax) from all sources including income from your employment, self-employment, retirement pay, or other government benefits. Alimony, child support, or separate maintenance income is optional to include.

questions.name: login
questions.title: Acceso
questions.dynamicModalPopupContent:
Thank you!

Your account has been created.

We are sending an email to your inbox with a link to verify your account.

In order to access your account in future, you will need to click the link in that email to verify the account (you do not need to do it at this time).

questions.name: email
questions.title: Great Choice!
questions.errormessage: Please enter a valid Email Address

questions.name: bankLinking
questions.title: Connect Your Bank Account
questions.plaidDescription: We partner with Plaid, which allows you to securely connect your bank account, so we can verify your income and/or bank account information for funding purposes.
questions.bankDescription: If you don't want to use Plaid, click the link below to submit manual bank statements. We'll need to review them manually, which may delay your application.
questions.errormessage: Please select PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG format below 2MB
questions.loaderMessage:
Validating Bank Account
Linking Bank Account
Generating Documents for Signature

questions.name: PinwheelLinking
questions.title: Let's Verify Your Income
questions.pinwheelDescription: To verify your income, we have partnered with Pinwheel. With Pinwheel, you can securely connect to your payroll, allowing us to verify your income immediately.
questions.bankDescription: If you do not wish to proceed with Pinwheel, you can choose to provide bank statements by clicking on the hyperlink below.
questions.errormessage: Please select PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG, TXT, DOC, DOCX format below 2MB
questions.loaderMessage:
Validating Bank Account
Linking Bank Account
Generating Documents for Signature

questions.name: bankName
questions.description: We need to verify the bank account where funds will be deposited and from which payments will be deducted.

questions.title: Back

questions.titlebold: Proof of Income and Account Ownership

questions.name: paystubs[]
questions.description2: Please provide the following documents to verify your income and bank account ownership: Most recent paystub (less than 30 days old) Bank statements showing your name and account number.
questions.errormessage: Please select PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG format below 2MB

questions.name: statements[]
questions.errormessage: Please select PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG format below 2MB

questions.name: docType
questions.description: We require identification in the form of a valid photo ID (e.g. Drivers License, Passport or Valid State Issued ID).
questions.description2: Please upload a clear image (front and back) of the ID document below.

questions.name: docusign
questions.title: You're almost finished !
questions.description: For document signatures, we have partnered with Docusign. When you click the Proceed button below, you will be transfered to Docusign. Once there, simply click the yellow start button and sign and intial as prompted. When you are finished, you will be returned here.

questions.name: thankYou
questions.title: Thanks for submitting your application with Wallet Wizard! We will get back to you once we verify your details.

questions.name: borrowerConsent
questions.required: Marque al menos un tipo de producto

summaryInfo.title: I consent to Wallet Wizard obtaining a hard pull credit report on me in connection with my application for a loan with Wallet Wizard. I understand that  this hard pull credit report may negatively impact my credit score and that it will be used by Wallet Wizard in evaluating my loan application.

questions.name: borrowerConsent1
questions.required: Marque al menos un tipo de producto

summaryInfo.title: I consent to Wallet Wizard verifying my income and employment (where applicable). I agree that Wallet Wizard may verify my income and employment by contacting my employer, through the use of third-party vendors, or through any other means.
summaryInfo.titleCSS: col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-md-11 col-lg-11 summarypage-margin-zero employmentConsent-sp

questions.name: borrowerConsent2
questions.required: Marque al menos un tipo de producto

summaryInfo.title: I certify that the information I have supplied under this loan application is true and correct.
summaryInfo.titleCSS: col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-md-11 col-lg-11 summarypage-margin-zero employmentConsent-sp

questions.name: coBorrowerConsent
questions.required: Marque al menos un tipo de producto

summaryInfo.title: I consent to GDSLink conducting a hard credit pull.

questions.name: agreementTerms
questions.title: This will NOT affect your credit.
questions.consentText: By checking this box, I consent to Wallet Wizard obtaining a soft pull credit report on my in connect with my credit prequalification for a loan with Wallet Wizard. I understand that this soft pull credit report will not negatively impact my credit score, but will be used by Wallet Wizard in evaluating a loan offer.Please agree to terms and conditions

questions.name: agreeTCPA
questions.consentText: By submitting my information, I certify that I am a U.S. resident, at least 18 years of age and agree to our Terms of conditions, Privacy Policy, and Consent to Electronic Communications. Please agree to terms and conditions

questions.name: agreeWWTC
questions.consentText: I agree to allow Wallet Wizard to call or text me at the phone numbers I have provided to discuss my application for credit and for other marketing purposes.Please agree to terms and conditions

questions.name: reCaptcha
questions.title: This will NOT affect your credit.
questions.errormessage: Comprueba que no soy un robot.
questions.required: Comprueba que no soy un robot.

questions.name: ManualDocument[]
questions.title: Extracto de cuenta
questions.description: Requerimos los extractos bancarios más recientes de la cuenta que ingresó en el paso anterior. Cargue sus documentos utilizando las entradas a continuación.
questions.errormessage: Seleccione el formato PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG, TXT, DOC, DOCX por debajo de 2 MB

questions.name: thankyoupage
questions.title: Thank you for choosing Wallet Wizard to assist you with your Personal Loan needs!
